sentences.en: a bill that didn't add up.
sentences.cn: 与预算不符的帐单

sentences.en: Add a few drops to half a tumbler of water.
sentences.cn: 在半玻璃杯水里面加上几滴。

sentences.en: Add more honey if you have a sweet tooth.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢吃甜的就多加点蜂蜜。

sentences.en: Add the onion and cook gently for about 5 minutes.
sentences.cn: 把洋葱加进去，用文火煮大约5分钟。

sentences.en: Add the prawns and squid and cook for 2 minutes.
sentences.cn: 放入对虾和鱿鱼，烹炒2分钟。

sentences.en: Add them together, divide by five, and you've got the average. Okay?
sentences.cn: 把它们相加再除以5就是平均数，明白吗？

sentences.en: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
sentences.cn: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

sentences.en: added up the other competitors in one glance.
sentences.cn: 一眼就形成对其他参赛者的看法

sentences.en: Boil the chick peas, add garlic and lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 把鹰嘴豆放在开水中煮，并加入大蒜和柠檬汁。

sentences.en: Boil the water in the saucepan and add the sage.
sentences.cn: 把平底锅里的水烧开，然后加入鼠尾草。

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

sentences.en: His comments are bound to add fuel to the debate.
sentences.cn: 他的话必将为争论推波助澜。

sentences.en: I add all the figures up to 100
sentences.cn: 我把所有的数加起来一共得100

sentences.en: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.cn: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

sentences.en: More than a quarter of seven year-olds cannot add up properly.
sentences.cn: 7岁的孩子中1/4以上都不会正确地做加法运算。

sentences.en: Most restaurants add a 10 per cent service charge.
sentences.cn: 大多数餐馆加收10％的服务费。

sentences.en: Please add some salt to the soup.
sentences.cn: 请往汤里加些盐。

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: The witness's testimony simply did not add up.
sentences.cn: 证人的证词根本不合理

sentences.en: This movie adds up to a lot of tears.
sentences.cn: 这部电影赚了不少眼泪

sentences.en: To add spice to the debate, they disagreed about method and ideology.
sentences.cn: 他们在方法和观念上都持不同意见，这使辩论精彩了很多。

sentences.en: You can add ingredients to these desserts as they begin to set.
sentences.cn: 这些甜点开始凝固时就可以加入辅料了。

words.tran_cn: 蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）
添加；[数] 加法；增加物

phrases.tran_cn: 增加价值；附加价值；添加值
进一步证明；扩大影响；增强优势；加重

trans.tran_en: to put something with something else or with a group of other things
to put something with something else or with a group of other things
